availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Bird Holeman (Frankfort City Marshal and KY Public Printer)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, businessman. Shenandoah County, Virginia, native. Married Margaret P. Major on January 11, 1823. Moved to Kentucky in 1805. Veteran of the War of 1812. Founded and published the Frankfort Commonwealth in Frankfort. Elected Public Printer for several terms. City Marshal of Frankfort.

bibl.p: "Another Old Soldier Gone," Louisville Courier-Journal, November 13, 1880, pg. 3. "Genealogical and Historical," Louisville Courier-Journal, March 29, 1896, pg. 10.
